title: What made the trip more financially feasible

content.question: What made the trip more financially feasible for Datong?

choices.label: He earned money from working on campus.
He received money from his parents.
He won a prize on a television show.
He found a special deal from a travel agency.

content.answer: He earned money from working on campus.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
